name: nsp - changing the way we play video games
blurb: building a community of gamers and changing the way we play video games forever

rewards.reward: advertising special,  this will allow you to have your company's website address , up on The wall around the shop and every shop that ever opens, if your a game developer then you also get so much more--------- website in stores and online -------- in store and online promotion for every new game or project you start----------- in store promotions like cut outs or game images--------- and developer days where you come and share, test your product with the gaming community -----------so think to yourself how much does advertising cost per year, yet you could have this for the duration of the company's history all for 1 pledge, So secure an advertising spot now and get all these incentives for 1 price and it applies to every product or game you make in the future....... I will not allow ex rated or explicit websites!

Limited twitter offer- the 1st 500 people to donate \u00a35 to project, I will put your @twitter  address on the wall of thanks in every shop and on the website, with photo proof sent to you and a YouTube video showing everybody's @name, if you got a website on it then advertising for \u00a35

basic*\r\nthis will put your name on the wall of thanks for funding the project for everyone to see and in every new shop that opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history
Same as limited twitter offer but after 1st 500 spaces have gone! Will publish your @twitter account in every store that opens and the online website for people to follow you and your real name

silver*\r\nname, location @twitter address and a tweet that states your favorite game, console, charecter and online id. on the wall of thanks for funding the project and will be in every shop that opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history

A ***BLACK ***very limited edition tshirt which will have the logo, NSP and a personally thank you and I help change the way we play games on front of t-shirt and your name + @twitteraccount on back,I will only be making 502 t-shirts-  500 for donations and 2 for myself.if it takes off as I know it will that t-shirt will be defiantly a collectors edition and if it does turn into an empire, you have got something that would be worth quite a bit of money. Will be available in 300 black ,100 blue 100 red, so even the red and blue t-shirts will be one of a kind more valuable, free shipping paid for by me

gold*\r\nA plaque above a gaming booth and with engraved name, location, favorite game, console, charecter , online id and this will also be added to every shop that ever opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history

HALL OF FAME*\r\ngold package + your name will be the name of the hall of fame of competition winners e.g. daniel rumseys HALL OF FAME winners list, which will include winners of comps, really great hi scores, undefeated streaks, things that are worth a mention. this will also be the name of the hall of fame for every shop in a different location that opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history

platinum*\r\ngold package and i will name the monthly competition RUNNER UP trophy after yourself or a reasonable/acceptable name you come up with.(A REAL TROPHY THAT WILL BE GIVEN TO THE RUNNER UP FOR THAT MONTHS TOURNAMENT) the trophy name will also be the same for every shop in a different location that opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history

platinum*\r\ngold package and i will name the monthly competition WINNER trophy after yourself or a reasonable/acceptable name you come up with.(A REAL TROPHY THAT WILL BE GIVEN TO THE WINNER FOR THAT MONTHS TOURNAMENT) the trophy name will also be the same for every shop in a different location that opens in the future, so your name will be forever etched in the companys history
